H0.text: Carbon is the element present in all organic molecules.

H1.text: Oxygen is the element present in all organic molecules.

H2.text: Sodium is present in all organic molecules.

H3.text: Hydrogen is present in all organic molecules.

A5.text: The modern meaning of organic compound is any compound that contains a significant amount of carbon
